title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 275.3 - Withdrawal and replacement of arbitrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 275.3 - Withdrawal and replacement of arbitrator

State Regulations

The Board of Mediation, for reasons which the board
considers adequate, may withdraw the designation of an arbitrator in any matter
and may thereupon replace such arbitrator by another selected in accordance
with the board's usual procedure governing such matters; provided, however, that the withdrawal and replacement is made before the original designee has
actually commenced to perform his function as arbitrator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
275.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
